column3: thought i'd end up with sean but he wasn't a match wrote some songs about ricky now i listen and laugh even almost got married and for pete i'm so thankful wish i could say thank you to what you taught me and for that i say   thank you next next thank you next next thank you next i'm so fuckin' grateful for my ex thank you next next thank you next next thank you next next i'm so
